page.title: 07Pevensey Village
page.content: Over half the residents of Pevensey village are {pensioners}.It is a quaint English village with many interesting old buildings ,and some houses of up to 500 years old.The elderly residents form a closely knit community and rely heavily on local shops.They enjoy walking and gardening { Pevensey Town Trust}is made up of local volunteers who are responsible for the upkeep of the{Court House}and the{Old Cattle Market,}now used as a car park.East Sussex Council is responsible for many local services. Local people are hopeful that they will provide a by-pass to take{heavy {traffic}away from Pevensey High Street Southdown buses also serve this community.The small fire station has one appliance and is run by a team of part_time firemen.One fireman is also the postman for Pevensey village.
